quote: It occurred to me that if I were a ghost, this ambiance was what I'd miss most: the ordinary, day-to-day bustle of the living. Ghosts long, I'm sure, for the stupidest, most unremarkable things.
quote_letters: IT OCCURRED TO ME THAT IF I WERE A GHOST THIS AMBIANCE WAS WHAT ID MISS MOST THE ORDINARY DAY-TO-DAY BUSTLE OF THE LIVING GHOSTS LONG IM SURE FOR THE STUPIDEST MOST UNREMARKABLE THINGS
